subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James watched from the bench in street clothes as Norris Cole stripped Kyrie Irving of the ball with 2.2 seconds left to give the Miami Heat a win over the host Cleveland Cavaliers.
snippet: LeBron James watched from the bench in street clothes as Norris Cole stripped Kyrie Irving of the ball with 2.2 seconds left to give the Miami Heat a win over the host Cleveland Cavaliers.
